content: ladybug facecloth by kiki geiger happy spring here s a simple natural fiber facecloth for a natural re-useable way to wash or clean make up off your face any cotton yarn in your stash will work make a stack from leftover yarns and gift to friends this is a real stash buster enjoy materials yarn 1 skein of worsted weight 100% cotton yarn i used schachenmayr catania flamme 100% cotton color 00404 50g 120 m 1 75oz /131 yds made in romania needles us 8 5mm straight needles notions tapestry needle stitch markers size 4 x 4 / 10 x 10cm gauge 4 /10cm = 17 stitches kiki geiger designs ● © march 2025 kikigeigerdesigns blogspot com ● ravelry kikigeiger ● thebrowndog etsy com notes my cotton yarn was size 2 fine so i double-stranded throughout the project abbreviations bobble bind off co - cast on k knit p purl pm place marker r - row rs right side st/s stitch/es ws wrong side *…* - repeat pattern between * s pattern co 17 stitches r 1 4 k r 5 k3 pm k11 pm k3 r 6 k3 p11 k3 r 7 k r 8 k3 p11 k3 r 9 k r 10 k3 p11 k3 r 11 k r 12 k3 p11 k3 r 13 k r 14 k3 p11 k3 r 15 k r 16 k3 p11 k3 r 17 k r 18 k3 p11 k3 r 19 k r 20-23 k you can remove markers r 24 bobble on ws weave in ends ta da you re done kiki geiger designs ● © march 2025 kikigeigerdesigns blogspot com ● ravelry kikigeiger ● thebrowndog etsy com
